I am a full-stack software engineer who focuses mostly on the front end using React, NextJS, and Typescript. I started development using react in 2019 and have been coding since 2018. Additionally, I have experience with ExpressJS, Docker, Git, Tensorflow, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc. As a software engineering student, I also have a solid grasp of project management, requirement engineering, and the software development lifecycle.

## Currently Learning and Interested On

- Designing sarge scale applications üåè
- Artificial Intelligence and Deep Learning ü§ñ
